It is common in L for Metheg and Merkha to look alike. The Aleppo is missing at this place, but the HaKeter and MAM both have a Merkha in both places.

There is a Hataf Patah under Qof.

The Segol is under Yod.
Something was erased under the Vav.
There appears to be a faded Dagesh in the first Mem.
There is no Silluq (Meteg under Dalet).
